#  `r if(gitbook_on){knitr::asis_output("**Attachment 2 - Habitat Assessment and Fish Sampling Data**")} else knitr::asis_output("**Attachment 3 - Habitat Assessment and Fish Sampling Data**")` {-#raw-dat}

All field data collected is available `r ngr::ngr_str_link_url(url_base = params$repo_url, url_resource = "raw/main/data/", anchor_text = "here")`.

<br>

Habitat assessment data (including fish sampling and PIT tagging information) is available for download `r ngr::ngr_str_link_url(url_base = params$repo_url, url_resource = "blob/main/data/habitat_confirmations.xls", anchor_text = "here")`.

<br>

Raw fish data is available for download `r ngr::ngr_str_link_url(url_base = params$repo_url, url_resource = "blob/main/data/fish_data_tags_joined.csv", anchor_text = "here")`.
